sentence: U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker pulled out of a weekend event organized by U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene after she spoke at a white nationalist rally where attendees cheered Russias invasion of Ukraine and chanted Vladimir Putins name.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Walker wont go to Marjorie Taylor Greene event after she spoke at pro-Putin rally

sentence: U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker pulled out of an upcoming event organized by Georgia GOP Rep. Marjorie Taylor -- who's come under fire for speaking at an event hosted by white nationalists who praised Russian President Vladimir Putin's invasion of Ukraine, The Atlanta Journal Constitution reports.
author: Sky Palma
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene suffers more blowback as GOP Senate hopeful pulls out of her event

sentence: Senate candidate Herschel Walker wasnt the only big name to skip U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greenes pro-gun rally.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Prepare for surprises this week in Georgia politics

sentence: Greene is radioactive enough at this point that Herschel Walker pulled out of a joint appearance after Greene spoke at an event run by Holocaust-denying, Putin-cheering white nationalist Nick Fuentes an appearance denounced by both Mitch McConnell and Kevin McCarthy.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: The Way to Beat Ilhan Omar or Marjorie Taylor Greene Is through Their Primary Opponents

sentence: In Georgia, the presumptive GOP Senate nominee, Herschel Walker, has acknowledged that hes "accountable" for allegations of past violent behavior toward his ex-wife.
author: Charlie Sykes
title: Missouri's Eric Greitens is testing the limits of Trump's post-morals MAGAverse

sentence: Per CNNs KFILE: For years, Herschel Walker has told the same inspiring story: that he graduated in the top 1% of his class at the University of Georgia.
author: Bess Levin
title: Jared Kushner and Donald Trump Probably Wont Be Splitting a Milkshake With Two Straws Any Time Soon

sentence: They include Herschel Walker, a U.S. Senate candidate in Georgia who has been accused of threatening the lives of two women, as well as Sean Parnell, who ended his U.S. Senate campaign in Pennsylvania last year amid domestic abuse allegations, and Roy Moore, a 2017 candidate for U.S. Senate in Alabama who was accused by two women of initiating unwanted sexual encounters when Moore was in his 30s and they were 16 and 14.
title: Trump makes closing pitch for Nebraska candidate accused of groping

sentence: And in addition to the Thomas-Trump-Kavanaugh list Herbster was so eager to associate himself with, Trumps endorsements include Herschel Walker, a U.S. Senate candidate in Georgia who has been accused of threatening the lives of two women, as well as Sean Parnell, who ended his U.S. Senate campaign in Pennsylvania last year amid domestic abuse allegations, and Roy Moore, a 2017 candidate for U.S. Senate in Alabama who was accused by two women of initiating unwanted sexual encounters when Moore was in his 30s and they were 16 and 14, as The Washington Post summarizes.
author: Laura Clawson
title: Trump rallies support for Nebraska candidate, insisting he's 'innocent' of sexual assault
